member.name: T:System.Security.SecureString
member.summary: Represents text that should be kept confidential. The text is encrypted for privacy when being used, and deleted from computer memory when no longer needed. This class cannot be inherited.

The number of elements of value to include in the new instance.

member.name: T:Cauldron.Diagnostics.Debug
member.summary:
Provides a set of methods that helps debug code.
These methods are not DEBUG conditional and will stay in Release build. Use them with care.

member.summary: Returns a string that can be used to identify the hardware

member.returns: A string representation of the stacktrace

member.summary: Writes a formatted message followed by a line terminator to the trace listeners in the System.Diagnostics.Debug.Listeners collection.

An object array that contains zero or more objects to format.

member.summary: Writes a message followed by a line terminator to the trace listeners in the System.Diagnostics.Debug.Listeners collection.
member.param: A message to write.
